block.p: November wedding plans have been announced by Dr. and Mrs. Stephen M. Brenner of Scarsdale, N.Y., for their daughter Lauren Kimberly Brenner and Richard E. Maybaum, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Maybaum of Short Hills, N.J.

Ms. Brenner, 28, is a nurse at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York. She graduated from the University of Rhode Island. Her father is an attending gastroenterologist at Montefiore Medical Center in the Bronx.

November wedding plans have been announced by Dr. and Mrs. Stephen M. Brenner of Scarsdale, N.Y., for their daughter Lauren Kimberly Brenner and Richard E. Maybaum, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Maybaum of Short Hills, N.J.

Ms. Brenner, 28, is a nurse at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York. She graduated from the University of Rhode Island. Her father is an attending gastroenterologist at Montefiore Medical Center in the Bronx.

Mr. Maybaum, 30, heads the corporate restructuring group for Sanwa Bank in New York. He graduated from the University of Rochester, received a law degree from American University and an M.B.A. from Columbia University. His father is president of Harborchem, a chemical manufacturing and distribution company in Cranford, N.J.
